whiz.net.clients

Class POP3Connector

  • java.lang.Object
    • Ace
      • whiz.Whiz
        • whiz.WhizEntity
          • whiz.WhizObject
            • whiz.net.NetworkConnection
              • whiz.net.clients.TcpConnection
                • whiz.net.clients.POP3Connector

  • public class POP3Connector
extends TcpConnection
    Useful POP3 connector class. NOTE: built following RFC 1725
